name: Butterfly
baseMeaning: A colorful butterfly with wings spread.
tldr: Represents transformation, beauty, freedom, or feeling butterflies in your stomach.

contextMeanings.meaning: Feeling nervous or excited (butterflies in stomach).
Feeling giddy, excited, or in love.

platformNotes.note: Popular for transformation posts and aesthetic content.
Used in glow up videos and transformation content.
Common in emotional and relationship discussions.

generationalNotes.note: Associated with transformation, growth, and anxiety moments.
Used for romantic nervousness and change themes.
May interpret more literally as nature-related.

seoTitle: Butterfly Emoji Meaning - What Does  Really Mean?
seoDescription: Learn what the butterfly emoji  really means in texting. Represents transformation, beauty, or nervous excitement. Complete context guide.
